tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bookings (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    tour_id INT,
    booking_date DATE,
    reservation_time TIME,
    num_guests INT
)

CREATE TABLE bookings (
  booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  booking_date DATE,
  booking_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE tours (
  tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_name VARCHAR(100),
  tour_description TEXT,
  tour_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  tour_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
  booking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_id UUID,
  user_id UUID,
  booking_date DATE,
  booking_time TIME,
  total_price DECIMAL,
  status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE tours (
  tour_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_name VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR,
  duration_hours INT,
  price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR,
  last_name VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE reservations (
  reservation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  booking_id UUID,
  tour_id UUID,
  user_id UUID,
  reservation_date DATE,
  reservation_time TIME
);
